CustomField.formula:
IF(
CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Small Fleets"), "Small Business", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE1"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"SMB") ), "AE1", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE2"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"MM") ), "AE2", IF( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"AE3"), "AE3", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Major"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Enterprise"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"ENT"), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Field") ), "Enterprise", "Other" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Owner Segment
